00037 #ifndef __UVM_CALLBACK_H__
00038 #define __UVM_CALLBACK_H__
00039 
00040 #include <list>
00041 #include <vector>
00042 #include <algorithm>
00043 
00044 namespace uvm {
00045 
00046 
00047 //-------------------------
00048 // Delete Struct:
00049 //-------------------------
00050 // Delete function object.
00051 struct delete_object {
00052     template<typename Pointer>
00053     void operator()(Pointer pointer) {
00054       delete pointer;
00055     }
00056 };
00057 
00058 
00059 //----------------
00060 // Agent Class
00061 //----------------
00062 
00063 template<typename Arg>
00064 class uvm_callback_agent {
00065 
00066     struct abstract_function;               // abstract class representing observer function/method
00067     template<typename Fn> class callback;   // callback class containing function object (concrete)
00068 
00069   public:
00070     typedef typename std::list<abstract_function*>::iterator iterator;   // iterator typedef (convenience)
00071     typedef iterator callback_id;
00072 
00073     //-----------------
00074     // Member methods
00075     // ----------------
00076     uvm_callback_agent() {}
00077     ~uvm_callback_agent() {
00078         std::for_each(_callback.begin(),
00079                       _callback.end(),
00080                       delete_object());
00081     }
00082 
00083     // Attach a function
00084     template<typename Fn> callback_id attach(Fn fn) {
00085         return _callback.insert(_callback.end(), new callback<Fn>(fn));
00086         //_iterators.push_back(_callback.insert(_callback.end(), new callback<Fn>(fn)) );
00087         //return _iterators.size()-1;
00088     }
00089 
00090     // Attach a class member
00091     template<class Pointer, typename Member> callback_id attach(Pointer p, Member m) {
00092         return attach(std::bind1st(std::mem_fun(m),p));
00093     }
00094 
00095     // Detach a function/method
00096     void detach(callback_id id) {
00097         delete(*id);
00098         _callback.erase(id);
00099         //if (_callback.empty())      return;     // empty callback list
00100         //if(id >= _iterators.size()) return;     // exceeds size of list
00101         //if(*_iterators[id] == NULL) return;     // callback already removed
00102         //delete(*_iterators[id]);
00103         //_callback.erase(_iterators[id]);
00104         //*_iterators[id] = NULL;
00105     }
00106 
00107     // Notify Observers of callback - iterate over all attached functions/methods
00108     void notify(Arg arg) const {
00109         typedef abstract_function Base;
00110         std::for_each(_callback.begin(),
00111                       _callback.end(),
00112                       std::bind2nd(std::mem_fun(&Base::operator()),arg));
00113     }
00114 
00115   private:
00116     std::list<abstract_function*> _callback;        // list of callback functions/methods attached
00117     //std::vector<iterator> _iterators;
00118 };
00119 
00120 
00121 //-------------------------
00122 // Function helper classes
00123 //-------------------------
00124 
00125 // Abstract Function.
00126 template<typename Arg>
00127 struct uvm_callback_agent<Arg>::abstract_function {
00128     virtual ~abstract_function() {}
00129     virtual void operator()(Arg) = 0;
00130 };
00131 
00132 // callback class template.
00133 template<typename Arg>
00134 template<typename Fn>
00135 class uvm_callback_agent<Arg>::callback : public abstract_function {
00136 
00137   public:
00138     explicit callback(Fn fn) : function(fn) {}
00139 
00140     virtual void operator()(Arg arg) {
00141       function(arg);
00142     }
00143 
00144   private:
00145     Fn function;
00146 };
00147 
00148 }
00149 #endif
